monster.name: Baboon

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The baboon has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the baboon's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 (1d4 - 1) piercing damage.

monster.description: Source: Monster Manual p. 318, Tales from the Yawning Portal, Tomb of Annihilation
